name: JOJOBALL
description:
JOJOBALL is a 3D-platformer game by Pride Game Jam 2022 team iDIOt. This game is still in development.

You must roll and beat the level by reaching the golden door. Roll, roll, roll!

CREDITS

Alios - Music, sfx

Kraey - 2D art

Chris Hong - Game design, level design

Taisto Saromäki - 3D art, coding

_________________________________________

Please check out Alios' music:     https://alios.bandcamp.com/
